pageContext.claim: “We are spending billions of dollars to help people. In the case of one that Dr. Birx is very much involved in, AIDS -- billions of dollars. And you know what? It's a great thing. Nobody talks about it. Nobody gives us credit.”
pageContext.analysis: The United States has received tremendous credit for the PEPFAR program established by George W. Bush to help African countries manages AIDS. It is considered one of Bush's legacy achievements. Trump, in his 2020 budget, proposed to reduce funding for PEPFAR and other global AIDS programs.
